# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/styles/__init__.py
@source-hash: 54c8f707b17a29fd
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:57:33Z

## Purpose
Style registry and loader for Pygments syntax highlighting library. Manages built-in and plugin styles, providing unified access through name-based lookups.

## Key Components

### Data Structures
- `STYLE_MAP` (L18): Deprecated dictionary mapping style names to module::class strings. Built from `STYLES` internal mapping.
- `_STYLE_NAME_TO_MODULE_MAP` (L21): Internal reverse mapping for efficient style lookups, maps style names to (module, class) tuples.

### Core Functions
- `get_style_by_name(name)` (L24-53): Primary style retrieval function. Attempts three lookup strategies:
  1. Built-in styles via `_STYLE_NAME_TO_MODULE_MAP` (L32-34)
  2. Plugin styles via `find_plugin_styles()` (L36-38)
  3. Fallback convention-based lookup in `pygments.styles` package (L40-42)
  
  Returns style class or raises `ClassNotFound` with context-aware error messages.

- `get_all_styles()` (L56-61): Generator yielding all available style names from both built-in `STYLES` and discovered plugins.

## Dependencies
- `pip._vendor.pygments.plugin.find_plugin_styles`: Plugin discovery mechanism
- `pip._vendor.pygments.util.ClassNotFound`: Exception for missing styles
- `pip._vendor.pygments.styles._mapping.STYLES`: Core style registry

## Architecture Notes
- Three-tier lookup strategy provides fallback compatibility
- Plugin system allows external style extensions
- Error messages distinguish between built-in and plugin lookup failures
- Lazy loading via dynamic imports for performance
